effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.

short_effect.sun_moon: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack’s power will be doubled.
